post:
We have several vouchers for the following exams:

https://www.ripe.net/support/certified-professionals/ripe-database-associate-exam/ripe-database-associate-exam

https://www.ripe.net/support/certified-professionals/ipv6-fundamentals-analyst-exam/ipv6-fundamentals-analyst-exam

Students following a bachelor/master course are preferred as are young professionals. Proof of enrollment/employment is required as well as a letter stating why you should receive this voucher en conduct the course.

If more suitable applicants contact us, we'll conduct a lottery to determine the winners.

Please send inquires and application to our email, info swedendedicated com including why you should be given the voucher, thanks and good luck.

I hope this topic is in the right category :smile:
